Name: Donutis Simulator
About the game: You can prepare delicious and richly decorated donuts in your donut shop by purchasing the ingredients written in the recipe. During the game, you buy new furniture in your store and provide the best comfort to your customers. Don't forget to pay the bills! Jump in your car and enjoy the fun.
